There are two main shopping centres in Labrador City. The Labrador Mall is the largest. It is fully enclosed and it houses a large grocery store and a Walmart. The other is the Carol Lake Shopping Centre. It is a strip mall which also has a grocery store. It also has a movie theatre.

Golf
Surrounded by black spruce and the wilderness of Labrador West, with a view from some holes of Duley Lake.

Snowmobiling
Labrador has many miles of groomed trails as well as a vast wilderness area that sees hardly any snowmobile activity. Come to Labrador and enjoy some of the best snowmobiling in North America.
